text: Hi <@UKGV272KS>, that makes sense. So it would be ideal to have the region information as part of user profile attribute. Thank you!

:wave: Hello, team!  I hopefully have a simple question about HTML signatures for our organization.  We are trying to put our email signature blocks that are perfectly formatted in Outlook into HubSpot.  Any suggestions?  I'm not good at HTML.
It's probably easier to use a tool like HubSpot's own <https://www.HubSpot.com/email-signature-generator|signature generator>. The FAQ explains how to add it to HubSpot.
Thanks.  I tried that.  It's very rudimentary and we can't get close to our graphical formatting.
